events.message: I received my order yesterday but I want to return the product because it does not meet my expectations and I would like a refund.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case based on the keywords 'return' and 'refund' mentioned in the initial message.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah from the refunds team to handle the customer's return request and refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to return your order and receive a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can start processing your refund promptly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I want to return it because the product is different from the description on the website.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated the refund process for your order 123456789. Please send the product back using the prepaid shipping label you will receive shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the prepaid label. I appreciate the help and will return the product today.
We have received the returned product and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and to ensure that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you very much for your support and fast service.
Happy to hear that your refund was successful. We are closing this case now. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund case. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
